name: The Flood (itch) (Xhirp, Soft Sod, Wolfie49)
description:
How to play:

Click to add walls. You can add a wall every second. If a generator in the sector gets flooded, you will no longer be able to place walls in that quarter of the grid. Prevent the flood at all costs! The bar on the left shows the number of turns until the water level rises. The bar on the right shows the time until a turn is passed.

(This game is super unfinished because we (I) ran out of time - Xhirp)

Note: Better played as a downloaded game rather than in browser as the browser causes lag which means the timers don't work or render properly in most browsers.

Credits:

Design: Kyrion, Xhirp and Bont 

Programming: Xhirp 

Art: Bont 

Music: Wolfie49
